definitions: a person or thing that makes a screaming sound

examples.text: the screamer's screams choked off into a gurgling sob

shortDefinitions: person or thing that makes screaming sound

definitions: a thing remarkable for speed or impact

examples.text: he had a screamer of a lap going in his Penske-Chevy

shortDefinitions: thing remarkable for speed or impact

definitions: an extremely fast ball or shot

examples.text: Jones hit a screamer against the right-field wall

definitions: a sensational or very large headline

examples.text: his death caused a front-page screamer

definitions: a thing that causes screams of laughter

examples.text: the first time the play was performed it was a screamer

shortDefinitions: thing that causes screams of laughter

definitions: a large goose-like South American waterbird with a short bill, a sharp bony spur on each wing, and a harsh honking call.

notes.text: Family Anhimidae: two genera and three species

shortDefinitions: large South American waterbird with harsh call
